handlers.code:
x = math.ceil(x * 100)
y = math.ceil(y * 100)

screen.setCenteredText([[
    x: ]] .. x .. [[ y: ]] .. y .. [[
    ]])


if y < 20 then
    anti.toggle()
end

if y > 30 and y < 40 and x > 0 and x < 40 then
    setTarget(1)
end

if y > 40 and y < 50 and x > 0 and x < 40 then
    setTarget(10)
end

if y > 50 and y < 60 and x > 0 and x < 40 then
    setTarget(100)
end

if y > 60 and y < 70 and x > 0 and x < 40 then
    setTarget(1000)
end

if y > 70 and y < 80 and x > 0 and x < 40 then
    setTarget(5000)
end




if y > 30 and y < 40 and x > 60 and x < 100 then
    setTarget(-1)
end

if y > 40 and y < 50 and x > 60 and x < 100 then
    setTarget(-10)
end

if y > 50 and y < 60 and x > 60 and x < 100 then
    setTarget(-100)
end

if y > 60 and y < 70 and x > 60 and x < 100 then
    setTarget(-1000)
end

if y > 70 and y < 80 and x > 60 and x < 100 then
    setTarget(-5000)
end

screen.activate()

buttonColor = '#eeecc0'
onColor = 'green' 
offColor = 'red'

function setTarget(add)
    target = target + add
    if target < 1000 then
        target = 1000
    end
    
    data.setIntValue(key, target)
    target = data.getIntValue(key)
    anti.setBaseAltitude(target)
end

function getHeaderColor() 
    if state == 1 then 
        return onColor
    else 
        return offColor    
    end
end

function getHeaderText()
    if state == 1 then 
        return 'ON'
    else 
        return 'OFF'    
    end
end
